net.ljcomputing.repository.impl

Class AbstractRepository<T extends net.ljcomputing.model.Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ljcomputing.repository.impl.AbstractRepository<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Model associated with the repository
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelRepository<T>

    public abstract class AbstractRepository<T extends net.ljcomputing.model.Model>
extends Object
implements ModelRepository<T>
    Abstract repository implementation.
    Author:
    James G. Willmore
